Class MapController.Bridge

Enclosing class:

public class MapController.Bridge extends Object
Class allowing the javascript files to send data to the controller

    • goToSpecificStoreMenu

      public void goToSpecificStoreMenu(String storeName) throws IOException
      Displays a new (pop-up) window with products of the chosen store
      Parameters:
      storeName - the name of the store to display
      Throws:
      IOException - thrown whenever a non-existing store occurs
